assignments.companyDefaultDescription: The default policy applied to all employees. Manage defaults in the Policies tab.
assignments.deleteEmployeeDescription: This will remove the override for "{name}". They will use their team or company default.
assignments.deleteTeamDescription: This will remove the policy from team "{team}". They will use the company default.
assignments.employeeLevelDescription: Override team or company defaults for specific employees (e.g., special contracts)
assignments.employeeNote: This policy will override team and company defaults for this employee
assignments.employeePolicyDescription: Select a vacation policy and employee. This overrides team and company defaults.
assignments.inheritanceInfo: Policies are applied in priority order: Employee overrides take precedence over Team overrides, which take precedence over the Company Default. Create overrides only when needed.
assignments.noEmployeePolicies: No employee-specific policies. Employees use their team or company default.
assignments.noPolicies: No vacation policies available. Create one first.
assignments.noTeamPolicies: No team-specific policies. All teams use the company default.
assignments.teamLevelDescription: Override the company default for specific teams (e.g., different locations or schedules)
assignments.teamNote: This policy will apply to all employees in this team
assignments.teamPolicyDescription: Select a vacation policy and team. This overrides the company default for team members.

vacation.fallsBackToTeamOrDefault: Falls back to team or company default
